meanings.definition: A tool used for driving nails below the surface of a material.
meanings.sent1: My dad used a nailsets to hammer the nails neatly into the wood.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter reached for his nailsets to finish the job efficiently.
meanings.sent3: Why did the nailsets refuse to work? It had too much pressure!
meanings.sent4: Her precision with the nailsets was like a surgeon's skill with a scalpel.
meanings.sent5: The shiny nailsets gleamed in the sunlight, ready for action.

meanings.definition: The act of using a nailset to sink nails.
meanings.sent1: The loud sound of nailsets echoed through the workshop.
meanings.sent2: Precision is key when performing nailsets on delicate materials.
meanings.sent3: Why did the comedian bring a nailsets on stage? To drive the audience crazy with laughter!
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to perfecting her nailsets was like an artist mastering their brushstrokes.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic tapping of the nailsets was oddly soothing in the quiet room.
